title: Learning to Become a Team
itunes:author: Guests: Bill and Pam Farrel
itunes:summary:
Is it possible to know whether someone would be a good teammate and show you kindness even before marriage? John and Greg discuss how to show someone grace during the dating phase of a relationship, even when he or she makes a mistake. Featuring Bill and Pam Farrel.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/marriagepodcast or call 1-800-A-FAMILY

Receive Bill and Pam Farrel's book "The First Five Years: Make the Love Investment That Lasts a Lifetime " for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofm-podcast-2022-03-01?refcd=1411102

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-marriage-podcast/learning-to-become-a-team/#featured-resource-cta

Listen Anytime: https://store.focusonthefamily.com/thriving-in-the-early-years-of-marriage-digital-product?refcd=1411102

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
